languages.text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но по звону в ее голосе вы можете поклясться, что ее лицо искажено в гримасе.{/n} "И он помнит тебя, {name} фон Валанциус. Твое {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}маленькое очищение огнем{/d} не сделает тебя незримым для Ткача Судеб".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но по звону в ее голосе вы можете поклясться, что ее лицо искажено в гримасе.{/n} "И он помнит тебя, {name} фон Валанциус. Твое маленькое очищение огнем не сделает тебя незримым для Ткача Судеб".

languages.text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."
languages.original_text: {n}Лица женщины не видно за маской, но по звону в ее голосе вы можете поклясться, что ее лицо искажено в гримасе.{/n} "И он помнит тебя, {name} фон Валанциус. Твое {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}маленькое очищение огнем{/d} не сделает тебя незримым для Ткача Судеб".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman's face is unseen behind the mask, but there's a ringing to her voice that could make you swear that face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little purification by fire will not make you invisible to the Fateweaver."

{n}The woman's face is unseen behind the mask, but there's a ringing to her voice that could make you swear that face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little purification by fire will not make you invisible to the Fateweaver."

{n}The woman's face is unseen behind the mask, but there's a ringing in her voice that could make you swear that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little purge by fire will not make you invisible to the Fateweaver."

{n}The woman's face is unseen behind the mask, but there's a ringing in her voice that could make you swear that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little purge by fire will not make you invisible to the Fateweaver."

{n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little purge by fire will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

{n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little purge by fire will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht der Frau ist hinter der Maske verborgen. In ihrer Stimme aber liegt eine Schärfe, die dich überzeugt, dass ihre Miene zu einer Grimasse verzerrt ist.{/n} "Und er erinnert sich an Euch, {name} von Valancius. Eure kleine {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}Säuberung durch Feuer{/d} macht Euch dem Weber der Schicksale gegenüber nicht unsichtbar."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht der Frau ist hinter der Maske nicht zu sehen. In ihrer Stimme aber liegt ein Klang, der dich schwören lassen könnte, dass ihre Miene zu einer Grimasse verzerrt ist.{/n} "Und er erinnert sich an Euch, {name} von Valancius. Eure kleine Säuberung durch Feuer macht Euch dem Schicksalsweber gegenüber nicht unsichtbar."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de la femme a beau être caché derrière son masque, la dureté de sa voix laisse penser qu'elle esquisse une grimace.{/n} « Et il se souvient de vous, {name} von Valancius. Votre petit {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}autodafé{/d} ne vous rend pas invisible aux yeux du Tisseur de Destins. »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de la femme a beau être caché derrière son masque, une tonalité dans sa voix vous fait penser qu'elle esquisse une grimace.{/n} « Et il se souvient de vous, {name} von Valancius. Votre petit autodafé ne vous rend pas invisible aux yeux du Tisseur de destins. »

languages.text: {n}你看不见那个女人藏在面具之下的脸，但她刺耳的声音表明，她的表情此刻一定非常狰狞。{/n}“他还记得你，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你那小小的{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}火焰带来的净化{/d}，可没法蒙蔽命运编织者的眼睛。”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

traits.locale_text: {n}你看不见那个女人藏在面具后面的脸，但根据她刺耳的声音，你可以确信她的面目此时一定十分狰狞。{/n}“他还记得你，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你那小小的火焰带来的净化，可没法蒙蔽命运编织者的眼睛。”

languages.text: {n}女の顔は仮面の奥に隠れて見えないが、顔が険しく歪んでいると言い切れるほどの鋭い声色だった。{/n}「そして、あの方は貴様を覚えている、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。少し{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}火で清めた{/d}からと言って、運命の織り手の目から逃れることはできない」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

traits.locale_text: {n}女の顔は仮面の奥に隠れて見えないが、顔が険しく歪んでいると言い切れそうなぐらい鋭い声色だ。{/n}「そして、あの方は貴様を覚えている、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。少し火で清めたからと言って、運命の操り手の目から逃れることはできない」

languages.text: {n}El rostro de la mujer está oculto por la máscara, pero el tono de su voz tiene un aire que te convence de que está contorsionada en una mueca.{/n} «Y se acuerda de ti, {name} von Valancius. Tu pequeña {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purga de fuego{/d} no te hará invisible para el Tejedor de Destinos».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de la mujer no se ve tras la máscara, pero el tono de su voz que podría hacer jurar que su cara está contorsionada en una mueca.{/n} «Y se acuerda de ti, {name} von Valancius. Tu pequeña purga de fuego no te hará invisible para el Tejedor de Destinos».

languages.text: {n}Kadının yüzü maskenin ardında gizli olsa da sesinde, yüzünü buruşturduğunu açık eden bir keskinlik var.{/n} "Seni de hatırlıyor {name} von Valancius. {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}Ateşle yaptığın o ufak arınma çaban{/d}, seni Kader Dokuyan'a karşı görünmez kılmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's face is hidden behind the mask, but there is a sharpness to her voice that convinces you that her face is contorted in a grimace.{/n} "And he remembers you, {name} von Valancius. Your little {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}purge by fire{/d} will not make you invisible to the Weaver of Destinies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadının yüzü bir maskenin ardında gizli olmasına rağmen sesinde, yüzünü buruşturduğunu açık eden bir keskinlik var.{/n} "{name} von Valancius... Seni de hatırlıyor. Ehemmiyetsiz arınma çabaların, seni Kader Dokuyan'a karşı görünmez kılamaz."
